snippet: Although Texas’ abortion clinic restrictions were overturned, the leaders of the National Right to Life Committee are redoubling their efforts on the “humanity of the unborn child.”...
abstract: Anti-abortion group National Right to Life Committee is undeterred by recent Supreme Court decision striking down Texas restrictions on abortion clinics and physicians; plans to shift emphasis to promoting measures focused on life of fetus, which several states have adopted or are considering.
lead_paragraph: Although Texas’ abortion clinic restrictions were overturned, the leaders of the National Right to Life Committee are redoubling their efforts on the “humanity of the unborn child.”

headline.main: Anti-Abortion Group Presses Ahead Despite Recent Supreme Court Ruling
headline.print_headline: Anti-Abortion Group Presses On Despite Recent Supreme Court Ruling
